property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn and can block an additional creature this turn.

property.value: "On every plane, there are those who run toward danger." - Gideon Jura

property.value: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wrath is no vice when inflicted upon the deserving."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Many must die for the one who should not have perished."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even storm clouds bow to worship Avacyn." - Elder Rimheit

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing." - Song of All, canto 642

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With his dream of unification fulfilled, Darien became the last king of Kjeldor. Those who followed were known as the kings of New Argive." - Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}, Exile Dauntless Cathar from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The harder they try to extinguish my faith, the brighter it burns in the darkness."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying. Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tools of evil are mere things. And like all things, they cannot last forever." - Song of All, canto 881

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature. When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The battle is won. There's work to be done. / The Blessed Sleep must wait. / A fiend is about. It stalks the devout. / I'll save them from my fate." - "The Good Geist's Vow"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.) Scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Griffin Protector gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The drums of war stir the hearts of all who fight for righteousness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Karona's Zealot is turned face up, all damage that would be dealt to it this turn is dealt to target creature instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Knight of the Skyward Eye gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Order of the Skyward Eye does the bidding of an evil force, unwittingly stirring fear and mistrust across Bant in accordance with his plans.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such a lord as this - all virtues' height - Had never been, nor ever was again."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from red Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A river of lava is just another river to cross."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Loyal Sentry blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Loyal Sentry.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His watch ends only when he does.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if you didn't lose life this turn, you may put a quest counter on Luminarch Ascension. (Damage causes loss of life.) {1}{W}: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying. Activate only if Luminarch Ascension has four or more quest counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}, Sacrifice a permanent: This creature gains flying until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A boon from the angels should never be cast aside." - Manfried Ulmach, Chief Inquisitor

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gods are fascinated by innocence, perhaps because it's a quality they themselves lack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod. When you sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod, you gain 10 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Hedrax stepped into oblivion, he welcomed the unwavering silence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a creature you control dies, sacrifice Promise of Bunrei. If you do, create four 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not afraid to die today nor afraid of what death will bring."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 6 life. Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Renewed Faith, you may gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Skepticism fades in the face of the miraculous.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all graveyards. If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some corpses the Golgari cannot claim. Some souls the Orzhov cannot shackle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One alone is fearsome; one among many is unstoppable." - Benalish proverb

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thraben is our home and I will not see it fall to this unhallowed horde."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Guilds be damned. We can fend for ourselves." - Vennick of the Gateless

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no stronger armor than the bravery of those beside you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you." - Takara, to Eladamri

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. {1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target red spell. • Destroy target red permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Origin Query will wait. We must ensure we survive to return to it." - Pelyus, vedalken ordinar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kongming and Lu Su tricked Wei troops into shooting over 100,000 arrows at them to later use against the Wei at Red Cliffs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Brine Elemental is turned face up, each opponent skips their next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Water calls to water, and the world is left exhausted and withered in its wake.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She knows every step of this coastline, both above and below the surface, and she has hideouts all along the way. She will get you there." - Jori En, expedition leader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {W} was spent to cast it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All Mirri wanted to do was rest, but she couldn't ignore a nagging suspicion as she followed Crovax's skulking form.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Cursecatcher: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of all the things that can be stolen, opportunity is the most valuable."

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target creature spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph - Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Fathom Seer is turned face up, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No tactic transforms a battle like a well-timed carnivore.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {U}: Tap enchanted creature. {U}: Untap enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a strong mind moves, form and energy shift to heed it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Island {2}: Enchanted Island becomes a 3/2 blue Spirit creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land. When enchanted Island is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Falls from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Going down with the ship is just the beginning.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the final days before the disaster, all the crabs on Tolaria migrated from inlets, streams, and ponds back to the sea. No one took note.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library. [0]: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order. −1: Return target creature to its owner's hand. −12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles their hand into their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonlegendary creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can become anything if I just put my mind to it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch." - Naimah, Femeref philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever another creature dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even more than carrion, they crave the last words of the dying.

property.value: "There are no obstacles, only different paths."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who expect betrayal at every turn are seldom disappointed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phantasmal Bear becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know it to be false, but when its claws find you, what you know won't matter much at all." - Pol Jamaar, illusionist

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Reef Worm dies, create a 3/3 blue Fish creature token with "When this creature dies, create a 6/6 blue Whale creature token with ‘When this creature dies, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token.'"

property.value: Until end of turn, target creature gains "{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the geometries of the world collapse, a master of the aether can harvest power beyond comprehending.

property.value: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

property.value: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "True strength is in the mind, for the body is too malleable a form." - Politus, vedalken emisar

property.value: Flash Flying When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

property.value: As Vesuvan Shapeshifter enters the battlefield or is turned face up, you may choose another creature on the battlefield. If you do, until Vesuvan Shapeshifter is turned face down, it becomes a copy of that creature, except it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may turn this creature face down." Morph {1}{U}

property.name: Rules
property.value: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

property.value: Flying When Bloodhunter Bat enters the battlefield, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It returns eager to share the feast of blood and gore with its ghoulish master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target player loses 3 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spite of the Cabal turns meadow into mire.

property.value: {2}: Put a plot counter on Deadly Designs. Any player may activate this ability. When there are five or more plot counters on Deadly Designs, sacrifice it. If you do, destroy up to two target creatures.

property.value: Flying When Death's-Head Buzzard dies, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Infested with vermin, ever hungering, dropping from night's sky.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Brave scar or unfortunate tale? It all depends on your pain threshold."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once they reached Orazca, the Legion's explorers ransacked tombs and temples, hunting for the Immortal Sun.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, if Erg Raiders didn't attack this turn, Erg Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their skills are extensive, and their appetite for battle just as vast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The rules are clear. If you want to leave, you need only convince another to take your place."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It feeds on dry bones in the sand and desperate pleas in the wind.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No mortal could atone for Ihsan's betrayal. Redemption required him to become something else.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Laquatus's Champion enters the battlefield, target player loses 6 life. When Laquatus's Champion leaves the battlefield, that player gains 6 life. {B}: Regenerate Laquatus's Champion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chainer's dark gift to a darker soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how busy my schedule gets, I always try to take time for that personal touch." - Queen Marchesa

property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Nezumi Cutthroat can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The nezumi will do things for money no other thinking creature would consider. This, of course, makes them useful beyond words." - Meloku the Clouded Mirror

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.

property.value: "The second wind of ascension is Reaver, slaying the unworthy." - Keld Triumphant

property.value: An ogre's poisonous stench is like fine Kashkaval cheese to the noses lowest to the ground.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Opening Orazca unleashed more horrors than just the Immortal Sun.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {1}{U}: Returned Phalanx can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They lived in different nations and fought in different eras, but as the Returned, they link arms as one.

property.value: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All are not equal - neither in life nor after death. Bontu's favorites will stand highest in eternity." - Senifet, vizier of Bontu

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one - • Each player with exactly 13 life loses the game, then each player gains 1 life. • Each player with exactly 13 life loses the game, then each player loses 1 life.

property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On dark nights you can still see the light of the Vess girl's lantern out in the Caligo, seeking her lost brother. Those who follow are doomed to join her endless search." - "The Fall of the House of Vess"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it." - Mystic elder

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now that's dangerous."

property.value: The most frightening storms are those not woven by nature's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the threat of power has power." - Jeska, warrior adept

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

property.value: Any pyromancer can summon fire with a thought. The trick is putting it out.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We wield the fires of rage. War is our blood and destruction our birthright." - Crimson creed

property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell with mana value 3 or less, Eidolon of the Great Revel deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Enthralling Victor enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you stare at the sun for too long, you'll lose your ability to see clearly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead. Morph {R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Mountain {2}: Enchanted Mountain becomes a 6/1 red Spirit creature until end of turn. It's still a land. When enchanted Mountain is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Spires from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their eardrums may have given out, but the rest of them never will.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Leave no scraps, lest you attract pests." - Mardu threat

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw two cards. Target opponent gains control of Humble Defector. Activate only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You were once Mardu, so your body and will are strong. Now we must train your mind." - Houn, Jeskai elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A passionate recruiter will win a war before the first arrow flies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Megamorph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.) When Ire Shaman is turned face up, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {R}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Chemister: Cast any number of cards exiled with Izzet Chemister without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first morning after acquiring her familiar, the wizard awoke with fleabites and mange.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kindle deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sparkmage shrieked, calling on the rage of the storms of his youth. To his surprise, the sky responded with a fierce energy he'd never thought to see again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Wheel: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fate is not as fixed as you might think."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They'll attack whatever's in front of them - as long as you tell them where that is.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The embers of our homes still smolder, and already the villages of Kjeldor burn in retaliation. What they have started, we will finish." - Lovisa Coldeyes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Pyre Hound.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its growl is the crackling and popping of a wildfire untamed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target blue spell. • Destroy target blue permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile Simian Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's rarely worth questioning where the mana comes from. Just be grateful." - Jaya Ballard, task mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skeletonize deals 3 damage to target creature. When a creature dealt damage this way dies this turn, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token with "{B}: Regenerate this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire burns away both flesh and freedom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Skirk Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature that player controls. Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}: Spikeshot Goblin deals damage equal to its power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Proximity discouraged. Do not approach." - Vulshok field guide

property.name: Rules
property.value: Thresher Lizard gets +1/+2 as long as you have one or fewer cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sound of its plated tail beating on desert rocks is often mistaken for the footfalls of a much larger predator.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack. They need signals to tell them when to stop.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's right to fear those that you keep locked away." - Rahilda, Vildin-Pack alpha

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Zada, Hedron Grinder, copy that spell for each other creature you control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A hedron holds magic for a thousand years - or less, if need be."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Megamorph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.) When Ainok Survivalist is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Treefolk and elves share a common interest in the forests, but really the elves just feel at home with the view from above.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Broodhatch Nantuko is dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens. Morph {2}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play lands from the top of your library. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single seed unleashes a flurry of growth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G}. Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more. - Elvish teaching

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) As long as you control a red permanent, Ember Weaver gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each night, the sun unravels and blows away. Each day, the spiders set a new one in the sky." - Sunseeder myth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter the timeline, some legends will endure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the most effective tactics stand the test of time." - Gamelen, Citanul elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life. Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Iwamori of the Open Fist enters the battlefield, each opponent may put a legendary creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kavu might be above you - Llanowar expression meaning "keep an open mind"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever an opponent gains life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Kavu Predator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a withered world, the scent of healthy prey is enough to drive a predator to frenzy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {6}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it walked, it altered geography. When it bellowed, it changed the weather.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. (Do this before you draw.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may reveal a creature or land card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best wishes include the will to tame their consequences.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The clamor of war ceased as both armies stood and marveled at the beauty of Gaea's work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. {T}: Tap all untapped Wolf creatures you control. Each Wolf tapped this way deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power divided as its controller chooses among any number of those Wolves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nettle Sentinel doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you cast a green spell, you may untap Nettle Sentinel.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though Shadowmoor's monster-haunted wilds beckon, she never leaves her post.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let nothing own the skies but the wind." - Dejara, Giltwood druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total mana value 6 or less, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample. When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, {T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The thunder of hooves is music to my ears."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{G}{G}. If you don't, you lose the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The need for the pack is bred in their bones. Their true strength will not show itself for any other purpose." - Garruk Wildspeaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Exchange your life total with Tree of Redemption's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The executioner's tree in Thraben Cathedral holds the power to absolve more than the souls of the hanged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Forest As Utopia Sprawl enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Vessel of Nascency: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us." - The Invokers' Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even among the hardiest warriors of the Temur, loxodons are respected for their adaptation to the mountain snows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from white and from black Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Animar, Soul of Elements. Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Animar.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Baloth Null enters the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Humans use pigs to hunt for mushrooms, don't they? It's like that." - Harak, Malakir bloodwitch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blightning deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While the smell of burning flesh is common in Grixis, the odor of smoldering brain matter is a rare treat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn. • Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink {R}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Brion Stoutarm deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boggarts and disturbing bits of boggarts flew through the air with alarming and untidy regularity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Cloudblazer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the aether charts in the world can't compete with the trained eye of a talented scout.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After years of world-bending machinations, Bolas's triumph is at hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tribal rivalries and petty disputes were laid aside at Eladamri's summons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead. If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {2}: Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a creature card with power less than or equal to Grenzo's power, put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Lorescale Coatl.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The enlightenment I never found in etherium I have found traced in the coatl's scales." - Ranalus, vedalken heretic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}. Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to any target. {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash If an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with mana value X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yawgmoth," Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, "now you will pay for your treachery."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Which is worse - the sleep which never ends or that which never comes?

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, create X 0/1 red Kobold creature tokens named Kobolds of Kher Keep, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast it. Flying Sacrifice another creature: Prossh, Skyraider of Kher gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. You draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, reach Ruric Thar, the Unbowed attacks each combat if able. Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Shadowmage Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Stangg enters the battlefield, create Stangg Twin, a legendary 3/4 red and green Human Warrior creature token. Exile that token when Stangg leaves the battlefield. Sacrifice Stangg when that token leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With their factories long destroyed, some of Mishra's creations still toil in remote areas, endlessly performing and reperforming their last orders.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Whenever a player casts a spell with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color for each charge counter removed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When I said I needed a hand, I didn't mean this." - Gerrard Capashen

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile target player's graveyard. When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Perilous Myr dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To Mirrodin, an explosive. To Phyrexia, a missionary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: The passing of the sai presages the end of the old clan and the ascent of the new.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Self-Assembler enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Assembly-Worker creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It sees itself in all of its creations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its tines cannot be rung by mere physical force. Only magic of great power can start its eldritch resonance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sundering Titan enters or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even if we defeat it, what remains to be saved?" - Glissa Sunseeker

property.value: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is great wisdom in rushing headlong into combat . . . if you're prepared." - Kenjek, captain of the Thousand Swords

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Treasure Keeper dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Travelers bathe in the falls to wash away curses from the pucas who lurk nearby.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not linger in such places, child. There the gwyllions dance. If they find you, you will join in their revels for eternity." - Talara, elvish safewright

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At full moon, the river seeps over its banks and crawls through the woods like a blanket of serpents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Haunted Fengraf: Return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Center of the Sea, Eye of the World, Shrine of Enlightenment. Seek it for answers. Seek it for healing. Seek it and return transformed." - Scroll fragment from the ruins of Minamo

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The limbs of Pendelhaven extend as far as the meek roam, and reach as high as they strive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all deaths are etched with mythic meaning and iconic glory.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rishada is the gateway to free trade - but the key will cost you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hobs bury their kin far from home. They believe the dry, open ground keeps hags from stealing the bones and gwyllions from stealing the spirits.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As their roots soaked in a weak tea of bogwater and decay, the trees absorbed the essence of death into their living tissue.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.
